story_12_01000/2401_1001_0200_10:
Just when I need him the most, he has to go
and throw out his back!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_0300_10: I made it so far, and now I don’t have a team...
story_12_01000/2401_1001_0400_10:
But just when you think my fire’s gonna go out,
it starts to burn even brighter!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_0500_10:
“The grand tournament had begun at last,
but for the girl, a great challenge remained...”
story_12_01000/2401_1001_0600_10:
Huh? Who talks like that? Sounds like
somebody reading a book.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Phew...
We finally made it to Centra City, Chandelure.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Now we just need to hunt for a team...
I hope we can find some nice people to join us!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1000_10:
Oh! Hello there, Flint!
I had no idea you were here on Pasio, too.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1200_10:
You weren’t thinking of competing
in the PML, were you?
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1300_10:
What? Oh, yes! I AM planning on competing
in the tournament, as a matter of fact.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1500_10: What is it? Is something the matter, Flint?
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1600_10:
Whooooaaa! I just found the best
possible teammate!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1700_10:
Wha—?! Huh?
Am I missing something?!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1800_10:
C’mon, Shauntal! You gotta team up with me
so we can burn up the PML together!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_1900_10: Me?! Form a team with you?
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2000_10:
I know good and well how fiery your spirit is!
You and I together would be the strongest
team out there!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2100_10: I’m flattered that you think so highly of me...
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2200_10:
but if I compete in this tournament, I’m going to be
competing to win. I intend to take this seriously.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2300_10:
Yeah? Well, I will, too! As long as we both
give it our all, nothing is impossible.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2600_10:
Can’t you see how she’s
burning up with excitement?
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2800_10: Now have a look at my Infernape.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_2900_10: You can see it, right? That same fiery passion?
story_12_01000/2401_1001_3000_10:
Sure... But I don’t understand what any of
this has to do with winning the tournament.
story_12_01000/2401_1001_3100_10:
Don’t you see? Pokémon battles are all
about how hot your spirit burns!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_3200_10:
Just like our fiery hearts, our Pokémon’s bodies
and minds are flaming hot!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_3300_10:
I don’t think anybody can stop us if we team up.
We can definitely win this whole thing!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_3400_10: You really think...we can win this together?
story_12_01000/2401_1001_3900_10: I’m still not sure I understand your logic, Flint...
story_12_01000/2401_1001_4000_10:
but I do think we have a chance at victory!
With your fiery spirit and my keen observation,
I believe we can win!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_4100_10:
Yes! Let’s form a team, Flint—a team of flames,
igniting our passion for Pokémon battling!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_4200_10: That’s what I’m talkin’ about, Shauntal!
story_12_01000/2401_1001_4300_10: Let’s burn the competition down to cinders!
